Author: KatoMcFato
Text: Thanks good idea, what I’ve started doing is saying I’m full or don’t like some things as much now but I’ll take that in mind too then thanks.

Author: MyStomachIsAlien
Text: Is there certain food that makes you more likely to binge? Maybe just try to avoid that and eat more of something else. For me it's carbs, so I pretend that my body doesnt tolerate it and I always feel bloated or sick from eating flour, rice etc. That way nobody is suspicious.
